description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 29 parts (iii) and (iv) (Contamination - Block B: Blocks B1, B2, B5, B6, B7 and B8 only) and Condition 49 (Contaminated Soils - Block B: Blocks B1, B2, B5, B6, B7 and B8 only) as attached to planning permission ref. 1331/APP/2019/2314 dated 28-06-2021 (Development of 4 no. new buildings comprising residential units (in addition to those approved under planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2017/1883), a basement extension to Block B, flexible commercial uses (Class E) and associated landscaping, access, car parking and other engineering works).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Please be advised that this application permits the partial discharge of Condition 29 parts (iii) and (iv) and Condition 49, attached to planning permission reference 1331/APP/2019/2314, in relation to Block B: Blocks B1, B2, B5, B6, B7 and B8 only.
